page.title: 13 MY DAY - NATALIE BARRITT
page.content: For breakfast I have coffee and toast.After breakfast I feed the cats and dogs and then let them out in the garden.At 8.45am.I get in the car and our mum takes me to school.At school Mr.Barlow,the vicar of Ash,takes the assembly every Wednesday I put the hymns on the projector and after that sit and listen to Mr Barlow,then we go back to class. We have K.M.P.,Maths, English and Topic work.Then we have a break and I sell apples.They cost 3p each. After break we have some more lessons.At 12.00pm we line up for dinner. Once we have had dinner we play until 1.20pm.Then we settle down for the afternoon lessons. We might have a game of rounders or draw or paint or sew or practice for the school concert.At 3.30pm we go home.Sometimes I play at the farm,then,at 6.00 I have fish fingers and chips for tea.
